      • storeHashedPasswordAndSaltSharedPref

        public void storeHashedPasswordAndSaltSharedPref(PasswordCrypto.HashedPasswordAndSalt hashedPasswordAndSalt,
                                                 java.lang.String spAlias,
                                                 java.lang.String passwordAlias,
                                                 java.lang.String saltAlias)
        Stores the hashed password and the salt in the HashedPasswordAndSalt object to the specified SharedPreferences file under the given aliases.
        Parameters:
        hashedPasswordAndSalt - The object containing the password hash and the salt.
        spAlias - The alias for the SharedPreferences.
        passwordAlias - The alias for the hashed password within the SharedPreferences.
        saltAlias - The alias for the salt within the SharedPreferences.
